description:
At the Pirate Island of Beehive, Vice Admiral Garp, who came to rescue the kidnapped Koby, deals with an overwhelming number of pirates alone. As he and his fellow Navy soldiers try to escape the island, Kuzan, the former Navy admiral, stands in their way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Garp and Kuzan - A Master and a Pupil`s Beliefs Clash
Garp et Kuzan. Le maître et le disciple confrontent leurs justices !
Garp to Kuzan: Shoutotsu Suru Shitei no Seigi
Garp und Kuzan – Zusammenprall der Gerechtigkeit von Meister und Schüler
ガープとクザン 衝突する師弟の正義
